price: Nagsabi sila: “Talagang kung hindi ka titigil, O Noe, talagang ikaw nga ay magiging kabilang sa mga babatuhin.”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
